channel.title: Publications on Srikanth Baride
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Srikanth Baride

item.title: Reinforcement Learning Fundamentals: From Theory to Practice (Draft Textbook)
item.description: Chapters cover MDPs, bandits, value-based, policy gradient, model-based, and multi-agent RL with exercises.

item.title: Cross-Modal World Models for Sample-Efficient Embodied RL
item.description: We integrate latent dynamics learning with cross-modal attention and evaluate on tabletop manipulation tasks.

item.title: USD AI Symposium 2025: Program and Proceedings
item.description: We document themes across foundational models, robotics, healthcare AI, and trustworthy ML.

item.title: Explainable Colocation Pattern Mining with Reinforcement Learning
item.description: We formulate colocation mining as a sequential decision problem and design policies that balance pattern significance with interpretability.

item.title: Reinforcement Learning for Geospatial AI
item.description: We present a taxonomy of geospatial RL tasks and propose benchmarks bridging synthetic and real-world data.

item.title: Clinical Text Mining for Cancer Care: Challenges and Opportunities
item.description: We outline pragmatic strategies for de-identification, domain adaptation, and uncertainty-aware decision support.
